channel.title: Australia on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Australia on mattischrome

item.title: 2024 Albums of the Year #3: Acopia, Acopia
item.description: Acopia are a band from Melbourne Australia with that time honoured line up of one girl and two guys. This eponymous album is their second and it’s full of slinky electronic ballads that echo classic 90s trip hop. It’s got that same downtempo downbeat vibe, the sorts of songs that revel in sadness but also the joy of a killer bass line.

item.title: The Great Ocean Road
item.description: As a wedding present, Ingrid’s Mum Maria kindly took us for a trip along The Great Ocean Road, the longest war memorial in the world.

item.title: More Melbourne
item.description: On our second full day in Australia we went shopping in central Melbourne, before Ingrid’s mum Maria picked us up ahead of our trip along the Great Ocean Road.

item.title: Taking It Easy In Melbourne
item.description: On our first full day in Melbourne we took it easy. It was warm and sunny, so different to the weather we’d left behind!
